00015 /* a (virtual) class for generic image transformation */
00016 
00017 class ImageTransfo 
00018 {
00019  protected:
00020     string SourceName();
00021   public :
00022 
00023 
00025   virtual bool IsValid() const = 0;
00026 
00028   virtual void TransformImage(const FitsImage &Source, FitsImage& Transformed,
00029                               const ReducedImage *Source, 
00030                               ReducedImage *Result, double DefaultVal = 0) const = 0;
00031 
00033   virtual void TransformWeightImage(const FitsImage &Source, 
00034                                     FitsImage& Transformed) const = 0;
00035 
00036 
00037 
00039   virtual void TransformBoolImage(const FitsImage &Source, 
00040                                   FitsImage& Transformed) const = 0;
00041 
00043   virtual void TransformCatalog(const SEStarList &Catalog, 
00044                                 SEStarList &Transformed) const = 0;
00045     
00047   virtual ImageTransfo* Clone() const = 0;
00048 
00050   virtual void dump(ostream &s = cout) = 0;
00051 
00052   virtual ~ImageTransfo() {} ;
00053 
00054 };

00060 class ImageGtransfo : public ImageTransfo {
00061  private:
00062   string geomRefName; 
00063   Gtransfo *transfoFromRef;

00065   double scaleFactor; // 1d scale factor (== sqrt(jacobian))
00066   Frame outputImageSize; // the frame on which we want the input image to be resampled.
00067

00074   ImageGtransfo();

00078   Gtransfo *TransfoToRef() const {return transfoToRef;}
00080   const Gtransfo* FromRef() const;
00081
